website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, affordable pepper mill that is perfect for all types of peppercorn.
pros: Sealed acrylic chamber keeps peppercorn safe from dust and debris
Equipped with a blue LED light that gives the grinder a distinct appearance
cons: May turn off as soon as you start to tip the grinder

website_summaries.verdict: Versatile model with the ability to grind herbs, spices, and peppercorns. Edgy, modern look that fits well in any kitchen.
pros: Adjustable grain size suits any preference
Solid construction with powerful grinding, especially with coarse salt crystals
cons: Takes 6 AAA batteries, and some reports of broken grinding mechanisms after less than one year

customer_reviews.title: The new one works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after the 2nd use, even got small metal piece in my food (luckily I found it-see photo)!!! Seemed to work well until that point, you just turn it upside down and out comes the pepper, love the light feature. Very disappointed. UPDATED REVIEW: The company contacted me after my review and offered me a new grinder. It arrived today and so far so good! It works very well, it has a really smooth grinding operation and I love the blue light that lights up what your adding pepper to!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Gaines

customer_reviews.title: The very best in customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product worked just fine grinding pepper for 13 months which is one month past the warranty before it completely quit. Is supposed to have a lifetime guarantee, so now I will see just exactly what that means when I contact the company. Upon connecting with the company I was pleasantly pleased due find out they were going to replace the unit. Needless to say I was unbelievably happy at this point, I received the new unit very quickly and now completely satisfied. The grinder is an excellent unit and I hope to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Conscientious Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 92 days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grinder three months ago and it gave my wife and I (no children) good service until recently several weeks ago the pepper grind became courser and courser until yesterday when th grind mechanism broke completely off at the housing. I am very disappointed that I am left with a useless grinder after such a very short time of light use. Our last battery powered grinder lasted over nine years. Hopefully the manufacturer will read this and do what is right. If so I will upgrade my review.
customer_reviews.author: LAWSON P. CALHOUN, JR

customer_reviews.title: This one works as I need it to, and here's why.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a battery powered pepper grinder that I could use single handed, that gave me a satisfying ground of pepper. This was my fourth purchase attempting to meet this want. The first three grinders were anemic and/or impossible to refill without breaking. This one is a keeper - it's a workhorse, nothing anemic or fragile about it! The light illuminates the pepper as it falls to the food. Perfect. I'm very happy with this purchase and if someone stole this grinder, I would replace it with the same. ***** 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: WFC

customer_reviews.title: IT'S not as gimmicky as you think
customer_reviews.text: My initial impression of these was that they seemed a bit Goofy with high-end materials. Although the blue LED light is a bit much and white would have been preferred it definitely does help when your tipping it into a pot to see how much is being put in there if you don't have a light over your range. The different ranges from fine to coarse grind is really large and being able to use this one-handed while the other is dirty is a lifesaver in kitchen if you cook frequently
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use SMART GRINDER and it provides a nice fine grind!
customer_reviews.text: After opening up the grinder I was surprised to see that it runs off of 6 AAA-batteries in order to function correctly. Luckily it seems to work flawlessly and makes adding salt and pepper an effortless operation. Once the grinder is about half way tipped over it begins to turn on and shows off a blue LED light which will signify that it's working.
customer_reviews.author: RealityCheckVR

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the set in Jan. Sparsely used and one ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the set in Jan. Sparsely used and one of them is already burned out. I expect the seller to stand by its product and make this right.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sahni

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have not had consistent results with this item. Regardless of setting, there are large pieces of pepper that are too hard to consume. Find myself going back to my old two hand model for better results. Update 9-14-18: Have to give 5 stars for customer service. A note and replacement were received in short order. The replacement is working properly right out of the box. Hopefully no more pepper grinders will be needed. Would consider future purchases from this company.
customer_reviews.author: tiasmom0707Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it, but it won't last!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on August 29, 2018. Today, November 3, 2018, it fell apart, and is now totally useless. The nut on the grind shaft keeps shooting off. The warranty was for 30 days. I should have believed that it might only last that long. How do I get my money back? Customer Service responded rapidly and sent me a new grinder. The nut on the grind shaft fell off immediately. I cannot tell if this is a bug or a feature. Is it supposed to fall off? Will it still be good for grinding pepper? Ask me again in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: MF Del Mar CA

customer_reviews.title: Quit working less than 1 yr in :(
customer_reviews.text: I love these electric shakers but one of mine just quit working out of nowhere and I've owned it for less than a year. I tried new batteries and still nothing, the blue light turns on with the gravity but no grinding happens. I'm sad that it broke and am not sure how to contact manufacturer for possible replacement. :(
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: 2x received this item,  but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item twice. Both times have had to issue, but seller was exceptional at quickly replacing 1st one that had an inoperable middle piece used to control size of the granules. Decided l wanted one to use for grinding salt, but 2nd order also had damage. However the replacement for my first order that the seller sent has lasted me and still working quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: Broke...
customer_reviews.text: We loved it first but the gray knob fell off on my plate when I was using the grinder and I can't fix it. I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: QUIT WORKING DAYS AFTER IT COULDN'T BE RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THIS PEPPER MILL BUT IT QUIT WORKING 13 DAYS AFTER THE RETURN WINDOW CLOSED. I kept replacing batteries and that did not work. So the only thing I can figure out is that it may have been a return and repackaged as new. I did notice that the screws at the bottom that you would never used were stripped. Apparently someone was trying to figure out a problem before I purchased it as new. Nothing I can do now because it is too late to return, but hope I can help someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pepper mill when it worked. Although 6 batteries is a lot. It stopped working after a few weeks and I was going to return it, then it started working again. Yesterday it died. I replaced all the batteries with brand new ones, made sure they were all going the right direction and....nothing. Now it is too late to return it. My next one I will buy at a local store so I can return it if it dies on me. Most of the local stores have 6 months to a year for returns. I love Amazon, but most of the return policies are not that long.
customer_reviews.author: Misscre8iv

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: One of the grinders top fell off and the parts fell into my food. Not sure how to put back together. Update: 3/3/2018- The seller contacted me twice via email offering to ship me a new grinder immediately. All that they asked for was my contact information and address so that they could get one out to me right away. So far, I have not received anything and am still left with a grinder that does not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: RLin

customer_reviews.title: Only if you are a body builder
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get it opened for batteries or pepper. My son finally opened it and added batteries. By the time I got home, I couldn’t open it to add the pepper. It’s impossible to turn to open with normal strength. Since I can’t open it to return ( remove batteries) I guess I’m stuck with it. It will go into the trash. I had a grinder prior to this and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: I love these, but no control button
customer_reviews.text: These would make great wedding gifts as the presentation boxes are awesome, so I won't knock a star on the price like I normally do for things being so expensive, but you can't control when they turn on other than motion control. You turn them over and they are on running. I like that feature, but there should be a button that allows you to control that instead of it being automatic. Maybe a personal preference, but I don't think it would have been that hard to implement. If you are "ok" with that aspect then you will probably give them 5 stars. Just be aware they both take 6 AAA batteries each.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey N.

customer_reviews.title: Best electric spice grinders EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love at first sight. At first I was skeptical because each unit required 6 AAA batteries each, thinking it would make them heavy and awkward. It did not. I also was not sure if the compartment that holds the spice would be too small. It was not. Truth be told, this was the 3rd set of electric spice grinders I have purchased since December, but after returning the other 2 sets, this will be my last. If you have been looking for these, your search should end here.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D. Rust

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction; great grind
customer_reviews.text: Very solidly built feels solid in hand. Good capacity for pepper. Very consistent grind size once adjusted to my liking. Assistant was very easy with large knob. Light is very helpful to see how much pepper is added since the electric mechanism puts out more volume than a hand grind in a shorter time. My unit was overtightened at factory making clear container very difficult to open. A quick email response from support assured me I could apply much more force than I was without breaking it (or if oute did break they'd replace) so I was able to pen successfully with a weightlifter style grunt.
customer_reviews.author: Bru™

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: These mills were really tough to take apart and install batteries and salt and pepper. Once they came apart, they were easier after that. However, after a couple of day we found the pepper mill running on its own in the cabinet. We had to work with it to get it to shutoff. Then it happened several more times, the salt mill worked fine. We put in a return request and received replacements, which so far are working fine. It looks like the units need to be modified to make them easier to disassemble and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: john mayberry

customer_reviews.title: It broke after four months of use!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was working great when I first bought it, but after a couple of months, it started stalling when I wanted it grind peppercorns. I kept using it after this by shaking it, which seemed to get it going after it salled, until now, when it stopped working completely. I thought the batteries needed to be replaced, which I did. But this did not work. When I tried to retrieve the replacement batteries, the whole thing came apart with several nylon gears falling out of it.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: One of 2 unusable.  Both annoying.  Available unlogoed cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Grey grind adjustment knob not attached and could not be pressed into place (on one) email address given in instructions bounces. Blue light is annoying. Gravity feature make it worth it. Bigger, easy to clean pepper holder and because the other electric type with a button and spring a) falls apart in food and b) "poops pepper". Ordered from another vendor. No logo on plastic but identical so do that if you don't mind not being able to see the pepper on your food because the whole thing is glowing blue!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Luik

customer_reviews.title: 18 months and both stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Contacted by seller a few days after this review and a new set is in the mail. Original review: Both died after 18 months within a month a part. Had already repurchased when the first one died a month or so ago thinking one of the two had a shorter life than expected. Was very disappointed when the second one died which means unless updates were made I will be looking for something different in another 18 months. Loved them when they were working and used them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Brent O. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Power is Poor
customer_reviews.text: We used the grinder for about a year and it failed. Prior to the total failure the six AAA batteries never discharged as a unit. After a few months of use I started checking the batteries with a meter and found only one of the batteries totally discharged, the others tested with full capacity. So I replaced only the discharged battery. This was a lot of work to keep the unit functioning as each time I checked each of the batteries and only replaced the one that discharged. But the design is good for people with limited dexterity. I would give it another try if the unit could be replaced, and hopefully the unit works better.
customer_reviews.author: LutsLarPam

customer_reviews.title: Like Yin & Yang, One works & one doesnt
customer_reviews.text: For what you get, the 2 grinders look amazing. I bought them a few months ago and didnt have the chance to use them just until renovations were done. Inserting the batteries were easy enough since its a simple twist and click mechanism. The pieces of salt or pepper can be customized to your liking. However what I received was only 1 working grinder and 1 paperweight. The light works when you invert the grinder, but nothing comes out and it seems the motor is broken. The pepper grinder I have is amazing until it breaks, and my new paperweight can probably be my dog's new toy.
customer_reviews.author: steven leung

customer_reviews.title: where's the pepper?
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful--blue glowing light, nice housing design--turn it over and it starts...but no pepper comes out. I will die of old age waiting for it to pepper one egg! You can shake it, pound it, adjust it but until you practically open the gauge to where all the peppercorns fall out you do not get pepper. I have fresh brand new batteries in it---it is turning but not grinding. What a waste. Does no one product test merchandise before it is manufactured? Or after??
customer_reviews.author: blacklily

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Great set of salt and pepper shakers and a great conversation starter when guests try to use them!
customer_reviews.text: So initially when i ordered these I debated about ordering a Amazon Warehouse Deals set and opted for a new set. I unfortunately received a set that had been used and returned. When I wrote a review and sent the sender feedback on the shipment they immediately contacted me to let me know there had been a mix up and they were sending me a new set. I didn't even have to trouble myself with sending the other back. Now that we have a new set and are using them we love them! We get lots of compliments from our dinner guests! Thanks Chew Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Elzinkev

customer_reviews.title: Really great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about getting these. I opened the lid on the first one, put the batteries in, filled it with pepper and voila! It worked perfectly. Then I went to open the second one and I couldn't get the lid off for anything. I contacted the company and they offered right away to send me another one. In between getting that email, my son came home and with not too much effort, got the lid off. Of course I loosened it for him, but... I was very impressed that the company was ready to send me a replacement. They both are now filled and work perfectly. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the grinder at first, but 4 months later it no longer works. The light comes on, but no more grinding. We pulled it apart and carefully cleaned everything, put in 8 brand new batteries.... with no luck. Plus if you are a big pepper user like us, you'll go thru alot of batteries. In the time we've had it, we had to change the 8 batteries at least once a month. After this one died (a couple weeks short of 4 months), we opted for a rechargeable pepper grinder. So if you're considering this one, take another look at the rechargeable options.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: SO much easier than a manual grinder!
customer_reviews.text: I love cracked salt and pepper. Only prob is, if you're doing quite a bit of it, turning the crank repeatedly for long periods of time can really wear out your wrist. I bought this to help alleviate that and I have come to really love these. They use 6 AAA batteries EACH, but its really worth it as it goes much faster with less hassle than a manual crank. I didn't give it 5 stars because the 'light feature' that they boast about isn't all that great. I could honestly do without it, but overall its a great product for what i need.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because pre-loaded grinders that came with peppercorns produced only VERY rough grind, leaving large chunks, and because wife's arthritis and carpel tunnel made it impossible for her to use conventional pepper mill. This works great out of the box. Hope it doesn't exhibit problems after time as some reviewers noted. Needs six AAA batteries, but guess needed to power grinder. Don't know if light is really necessary. Grinder works well so far. Thinking about buying another for salt.
customer_reviews.author: Daytona Bird

customer_reviews.title: Everyone LOVES this thing! - SEE UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It no longer works. :( Was using it and it just stopped working. Checked the batteries and put in fresh batteries. Still, not working. Haven't even had for a year yet. Very disappointing. I grill steaks often and many times for family and friends. Love using fresh ground pepper as part of my dry rub on the steaks and when doing a lot of steaks, using a pepper grinder gets old pretty quick. Saw this and decided to decided to give it a try. Works like a charm! Just tilt it over and it starts grinding. Was a big hit at our last get together as everybody asked about it and enjoyed using it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B & G Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Seems to always go back to very course grind.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit and easy to use (tip it over) but it seems to have a limited reservoir above the main pepper container. Tip it over and it will dispense for a few seconds but then you have to flip it back over and then start again. Not a big thing really, just an idiosyncrasy. It also sees to always go back to course grind. Some things I like to be course pepper, others finer. I twist and twist that knob and it reduces the grind temprarily but it always goes back toward course. Also not terrible, just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: Jimiriquoi

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how we did without it.
customer_reviews.text: This pepper mill is wonderful. I'm going to buy several for gifts. Just use one hand and tilt the mill sideways over food to grind. It even has a cool little blue circular light on top. If the grind is too coarse, twist the adjustment knob and resume. It's fast, sleek, quiet and pretty. The well-thought-out design has the grinder on top instead of the bottom so it doesn't leak pepper grounds everywhere, and the reservoir holds a lot of pepper, requiring less refills. This is a kitchen must-have.
customer_reviews.author: Gmom

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I had my first one for probably 2 years? Worked perfectly the entire times until the batteries died last week. When changing it, the whole thing basically fell apart and the screws were not accessible to put back together and the plastic gears fell out. Butttt I loved it so much I bought another one and got it in 2 days! I live in Hawai and although I have Prime, almost nothing comes to me in 2 days; but this did! Totally would recommend to anyone because manually grinding is a bid hard for me while holding my baby and cooking. And this one not even needing to press a button makes it better than all the other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Can't really speak to durability yet, but definitely easy to use and certainly giftable. These are the third battery powered pepper-mills we have owned. Quality assembly of quality materials. Best improvement so far is the glass container for the peppercorns. Allows for cleaning whereas prior devices had plastic and it could never really get clean. Definitely recommend for personal daily use and as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jandareno

customer_reviews.title: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend the product. It's a hit and miss kind of deal. You might get a good pair and you might not. I bought two pairs. I thought, I could give the other pair as a gift. The pair I got is useless. Just not good but the one I gave away is good. So I tried contacting the company's customer service. No answer. It's not a good investment for me if the company doesn't recognize customer's concern. Why support a company like that anyways? Not only you wasted your money--it's your time too.
customer_reviews.author: pICKy ShOPpEr

customer_reviews.title: Does not work one year later
customer_reviews.text: I bought the salt and pepper grinder and at first they were great. I really wanted to love these, but after one year of use, they keep getting clogged up and are not grinding well anymore. I will take it apart, remove the peppercorn that is stuck, and then it will work about 2 times before clogging up again. I did love the way they operate, by simply tipping upsidedown. It is just that they only lasted a year before trouble started. The salt grinder works a bit better, but is not working as well anymore either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The blue light is "meh." But I didn't buy it for the light. No idea why it is even there. But it works great grinding peppercorns. Lightweight, easy to hold, takes up little space, decently modern looking and a nice enough design it goes well in pretty much any kitchen. I haven't had it long enough to speak to battery life (which would I suspect be better without the blue light), but it works great. Perfect for what I wanted and needed -- especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdCoastCC

customer_reviews.title: Salt Grinder Quit Working!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for people with hand dexterity issues! Just turn it over and the salt & pepper come out, no added buttons to push, plus a nice blue light lets you see how much is coming out. I have arthritis and just LOVED, LOVED this set (when it worked) but the salt grinder quit working in August 2019, just 9 months from purchase! We checked the batteries but new batteries did not fix it. The pepper grinder is still working fine. So disappointed it didn't last longer. Wish I could just get the salt grinder instead of buying the set.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Will stop working after few days.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an electric version to hand grinder. After reading reviews, I settled on this mill. It worked fine for couple days and then stopped working. I did not want to give up and so I contacted amazon for replacement. The replacement came and it stopped working again. I tried everything like the first time. Changing the battery and cleaning. Nothing helped. I am past the return period and it is a dead piece in the kitchen now. So look for an alternate. Don’t buy and waste your money. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: srk11

customer_reviews.title: Broken Product - Was amazing before it broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the salt and pepper combo in black on June 13, 2020 for my husband and I. We absolutely love it up until yesterday when the pepper grinder seemed to Jam and when we took it apart to find the problem the whole mechanism was broken. We have been unable to fix this and it is unusable. I loved the product and wish it was still working. I was hoping to contact customer service but could not find contact information for them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: low effort and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly uncle who wanted something with little or no effort and this didn't disappoint. It's easy to fill up and triggers when turned upside down. My uncle who is rarely impressed was tickled when he first used it. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is b/c of the battery requirement. it takes 6 AAA which also makes it a little heavier than I would want. Haven't had it long enough to determine how long the batteries last.
customer_reviews.author: S. Desai

customer_reviews.title: Has a one year warranty but mine didn't make it past first set of batteries
customer_reviews.text: There is a one-year warranty on this product, but when you click on "warranty information" on the product page, you get a message to contact seller directly. Also, I just noticed the product page says "one-year warranty with replacement within 30 days of purchase". How is that a one-year warranty? We bought ours in July but the grinder didn't make it past February. I guess you can say "oh well, you got 7 months of pepper for $20", but I thought it would last longer. It seemed pretty hefty when we got it, but are disappointed that it died so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Fine, until it crashed
customer_reviews.text: The pink Himalayan salt is so difficult for this mill to grind that it totally blew out the motor. When I took it apart to put in new batteries, the salt was everywhere inside the battery compartment. Took it totally apart, cleaned out everything I could reach (including some pretty large chunks of unground salt), put in new batteries, nothing. Plus, the batteries got hot pretty quick, so definitely something very wrong. I have only had this 3 1/2 months and it is supposed to have a one year guarantee. It looks like it was only eligible for a free return for 30 days. Trying to get action.
customer_reviews.author: Jan McClure

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service in the age of cv19
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun and excellent product. I have really loved these for the past several months. I had an issue with salt getting backed up inside around the batteries on my salt shaker and the company replaced it promptly. They were so prompt to communicate back and provide good customer service, it was such a delightful surprise in the age of Corona where so many companies are lacking, this company really stands out! Thank again
customer_reviews.author: Sebastar

customer_reviews.title: Love,  super easy no fuss
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new set of shakers. Saw these and thought I would try them out. I didn't read the fine print and was dismayed that I needed 12 AAA!! I definitely had to buy some batteries. Now I'm up and running and I must say I LOVE LOVE LOVE these shakers. Only one hand and you're grinding your way to seasonings! Im even thinking of getting more for other spices and seeds. It was easy to set up. No mess anymore. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: skithetrees

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks - new one works great
customer_reviews.text: One of the grinders broke after two weeks of light use. The other one is fine. Since the return window expired while we were out of town, I will try to fix it myself but it looks like it will be difficult. After writing this review, I was contacted immediately by a customer service representative at Chew Fun and a few days later received a replacement pepper grinder. This one has worked fine, and I can't say enough about the Chew Fun customer service. The product itself is fun and easy to use, and a source of some amusement at the dinner table. I am hoping that the grinder lasts a lot longer this time and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Works almost too good
customer_reviews.text: Really great pepper grinder, blue light is a nice touch, easy change for how fine you want the pepper ground, and I appreciate that I don't have to hold a button for it to work (just based on whether it's upside down or rightside up). The only issue I have is that the pepper comes out almost too quickly, so if you only want a little bit, it's difficult to do. Maybe I'd look to the company to provide a speed option in its next iteration.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: If you have arthritis. This is right up your alley!
customer_reviews.text: Only complaints. Took me a while to figure out which s for salt and which was for pepper. The salt one has an adjustable knob (took me a min to find that out too), at the top for coarseness. Takes to many batteries. I hope this means it will last long, before replacing. But I love the look of them and the fact I don't have to manually grind all the time. (My other set is manuel.)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Powerful grinders do what they’re supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased some manual salt and pepper grinders from amazon a couple of years ago. They were never that great and thankfully one of them finally broke. That was my excuse to get new ones. After looking around, I decided to buy these and I’m really glad I did! With six triple A batteries, they are powerful grinders. My old grinder let chunks of salt and peppercorns through but I’m not having that problem with these. I have a course grind in pepper and finer grind for the salt. The light is a nice touch too. Just be aware - you’ll need 12 aaa batteries for the pair!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wannemacher

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Unless you like buying a new pepper grinder every year, this is not the product for you. I bought this in July of 2019, and it simply stopped working last month (August 2020). We tried replacing the batteries and looking to see if a kernel of pepper had perhaps gotten jammed, nope it just quit working. My husband, who is an engineer, took it apart to try and find the problem, but there was nothing other than the motor just decided to stop working. We loved the product otherwise, but because of this, I will be researching other brands to replace this one!
customer_reviews.author: 5glovers

customer_reviews.title: Can't Believe I Didn't Think of This Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grinder. I've used a pepper grinder for years and find it hard to believe I didn't think of these sooner. Just never thought of it, then saw one on an old TV show from the seventies. I had a little problem getting it open to put in the batteries, was a little difficult but I succeeded. Works great but I would suggest checking the batteries often for going bad or leakage, best to use the best batteries. I used it for a week or so and noticed a bad battery, but caught it in time so it didn't damage the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This Company’s Customer Service Rocks!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is everything I thought it would be and I use it every day. It’s so nice not to have to use 2 hands while cooking to grind your salt or pepper, you just turn it over. But I really can’t say enough good things about Chew Fun, the company that supplies these salt & pepper mills. I liked these mills so much, I ordered them for a friend last Christmas (2018) and she didn’t even try to use them until June (2019) and found out they were faulty. I contacted Chew Fun through Amazon & within a week I received the replacements, which work perfectly. Thank you Chew Fun for your excellent customer service & products.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Y

customer_reviews.title: Second times the charm
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/13/18: After leaving my review, CHEW FUN contacted me to replace the defective grinder with a new one. So far it has worked very well and I am much happier. However, it seems from numerous other reviews that the manufacturers’ consistency is questionable at best. I do appreciate though that they made it right. This grinder worked great the first use, but that was about it. The grind got progressively more coarser. Now I can barely get anything out of it. Definitely would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Love the automatic grinding and no mess
customer_reviews.text: One of things I always hated is that the bottom grinders would leave a mess on the table or counter top. This grinder solves that issue and automatically grinds for you. The only complaint I have is that the plastic is very rigid and cracks easily. While taking off the plastic reservoir on one of the grinders, it fell, cracked and chipped away a chunk of the plastic. I ended up having to buy another single grinder and keeping it as a backup for parts. Just make sure you have a firm grip on it because the plastic is slippery and the metal top is not the most grip friendly material.
customer_reviews.author: Les Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice Pepper or salt electric grinder. It requires 6 AAA batteries to operate. On the bottom you have area for salt or pepper. Operating is easy. All you have to do it flip it over and it senses that you want to grind whatever you want to grind. When you do that there is a blue light illuminating at the end of it. Simple at effective. It's a great gadget for your kitchen or it can make a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maciej

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. It works great and makes it so easy to have automatic grinding for rock salt (which is why I got it). Unfortunately, my review is so-so because only one of the two worked. Since I started using the one that worked, I figured I couldn't return the pair, so am disappointed I spent so much money for ONE working grinder. Kind of a rip-off if you ask me. But the one that works does work great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Making things right.  That's doing good business!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 mills and had a problem with one...the one I assigned to 'pepper'. I contacted Chew-Fun and before I knew it a new grinder was at my door. Making things right. That's doing good business!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Decent size chamber for pepper/salt. It’s got a sleek design and works well. The light isn’t a pro or con for me but my husband would love to disable it. The amount of batteries is kinda ridiculous but it does a great job and if it lasts for a few years will be well worth any minor annoyances. Wish I had purchased this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Eturn6

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this grinder. I am facing - and putting off - shoulder replacement surgery on BOTH my shoulders, which makes even grinding spices and peppercorns extremely painful. Enter into my life this fabulous automatic pepper grinder. My daughter says I am "over-peppering" everything. I'm just saying I LOVE using my pepper grinder! I want to buy another one for salt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: J-U-N-K
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, if it worked. After having to spend $15 in AAA batteries and filling up both spice containers, I found that no matter what I did, one of the shakers just did not work. The shaker with the salt did work, however, it was impossible to control the flow of salt coming out. Thank goodness for the return policy at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mindy hassel

customer_reviews.title: Look Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these salt & pepper grinders, my first set wore out in about two years . So I ordered a new set , however I am a little disappointed in the new set, to fix the settings is much harder and they do not grind as well as my first set . They also are a great gift item , but now I am hesitant about gifting because of the quality . They are easy to fill and love the light feature !
customer_reviews.author: littlethings

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Work Great
customer_reviews.text: The only surprise is that they take 6 AAA batteries each. I just received them so I'm not sure how long they last. I'm sure it depends on use and type of battery. They are a very solid made product. I love the blue light. I just love the look of them period. They grind salt and pepper very well and many different coarseness options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat one handed operation
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without this before. Why did I have to use two hands grinding up some pepper? especially while handling food and it's impossible to keep both hands clean? This just makes total sense. I salute the inventor! I'm not particular about the blue light.. It can be brighter and better than none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a few weeks and like it so far. Cannot comment on the durabuility since I have only used it for a few weeks. I like that the grinder is on top instead of on the bottom. My old mill that broke used to get pepper all over the bottom of the cabinet that I stored it in. I used to have to keep a small lid in my cabinet so that the pepper was not all over the cabinet. I alo like that there is a light so I know how much pepper I am dispensing. Had no problem with the seller or delivery.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonContributor

customer_reviews.title: ground contents will fall into battery area
customer_reviews.text: Generally works well, just that for some odd reason the seal between the nozzle and the battery area is nonexistent. Used it for a few months now, would have to clean out the battery area due to salt/pepper grounds getting in there. Would not think its a good idea for salt to mix with batteries, thank goodness I'm using rechargables which don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The last set had the button on the top and while they worked fine, they would leave debris everywhere since the grinder ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this set and I am impressed! I have gone through so many pepper grinders it's almost a joke. The last set had the button on the top and while they worked fine, they would leave debris everywhere since the grinder is at the bottom (they give you caps to prevent this but who has time for that?). I much prefer this design, it's intuitive and keeps the grinds from going all over the place. The light is nice as well. Will update the review as I use them more. So far, I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: arizonahd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large batch grinding
customer_reviews.text: When I'm cooking large pieces of meat like a brisket, standing rib roast, or pork shoulder where I want a large amount of fresh cracked pepper, I break this grinder out to do the work for me. No more tired forearms or switching hands back and forth to get several tablespoons of cracked pepper. The adjustable grind size is perfect for me to get exactly what I need for the dish.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: For the person who has all the kitchen gadgets
customer_reviews.text: These are soo cool! Everybody that over asks me where I get them! I had to replace one that I got wet. Like really wet. So keep them away from the sink. Batteries are a downside but to me it’s the price I’m willing to pay to have something portable that I don’t have to worry about charging. They last a few months on each set of batteries
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I had a different set before this that had a button to press and it never worked properly. This item it so easy to use! Just tilt and out it comes! You need to take time to adjust the grind setting especially for the salt, but once you do it awesome! So glad I purchased this! I may buy more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Better than the name brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try to replace a Sharper Image electric pepper mill. I'm sad I didn't find these sooner. They're just as good as the Sharper Image ones with all the same features but better! All you have to do is flip it over and it does all the work for you. It's also very FAST so you have to keep an eye on how much you're adding. We've also found that if you knock it over, the grinder will start but otherwise it's amazing! I'll probably get a set for my mom for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fox

customer_reviews.title: salt shaker will not shut off
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved them. The pepper one still works great. However, the salt unit needed batteries, so we replaced them, and once we put the new ones in now the unit will not shut off. It just continually runs. Very disappointing. We are past the return window, but for these to do this only a few short months after purchase is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The only thing I would say I do t like it’s that the pepper grinder one the knob it’s super hard and I can’t grind the pepper corns smaller they come out in half’s or big chunks... not suitable for certain things. Wish it would work right if I was able to adjust how fine the pepper come out I would have given it 5 starts
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I use one hand to apply spices/rubs, and one hand to hold/turn whatever I'm applying it to. It works perfectly for that, as opposed to a traditional pepper grinder where I have to use both hands. It's definitely powerful, I set it to the finest setting and it's a very fine grind.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lippert

customer_reviews.title: Big Mistake
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this product received so many positive reviews. First of all, there were no instructions included in the box. Since there is a video on the Amazon site, I watched this in order to figure out where to insert the batteries. However, I was unable - despite many repeated attempts - to open and pull off the top piece on either grinder so I could put in the 6 AAA batteries (not included). I'm giving it to Goodwill - with a warning note inside!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grinder June 22, 2018 the return window closed 30 days later and today September 2nd, 2018 with very little use, the grinder is dead. Batteries replaced etc... completely dead and not working. I would not buy this product again. I am very frustrated that it lasted less than three months!! Horrible waste of money. With no recourse for a return, I say shame on you Amazon! Please refund my money. And shame on the manufacturer! Stay away from this product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coarse grind black pepper
customer_reviews.text: I smoke many types of meat and like a simple rub of kosher salt and black pepper (coarse grind). Using a standard pepper mill was slow and caused pain in my wrists. This grinder does a great job of supplying a high volume of coarse pepper in a relatively short amount of time. The only thing I don't like is the auto-on feature, which can cause a mess of unwanted pepper to the unsuspecting curious explorer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chimack

customer_reviews.title: Can you say "Fun?"
customer_reviews.text: These are just wonderful! One of those unique finds that make you smile everytime you reach for one. Be sure to note that they do require a boatload of batteries BUT! my set has been used daily since December, still on same batteries. Grinds both salt and pepper to our liking after a bit of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: LuciBee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it because of the volume output but the best feature is, its battery powered. I use it for all meats especially Brisket. I can season my meats quicker and more efficiently and I can control the granular size. Not sure how long it will last but for now, it works like the lightweight champion of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Bustanil

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have arthritis and tendonitis in my hands, making it difficult to use the average grinders. They work exactly as advertised; I just turn it upside down and it comes out. The adjustment for the size of the grind works well and because they dispense from the top I don't have a mess on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: NannyKayk

customer_reviews.title: It won’t stop!
customer_reviews.text: My salt grinder stopped working so I cleaned it out thoroughly, but now once I put the batteries back in it started grinding and will not stop. This is a replacement for one that had stopped working altogether, so I feel bad to have a problem again, but I do! I love it when it works!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Wine

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and better flavor
customer_reviews.text: The instructions need to have better information. As for the pepper grinder it's self. Easy to use, better flavor from the ground whole peppers. Having the ability to size the grind of the pepper. How to open the unit leaves a bit to be desired. Away from the grinder, try to purchase hole pepper. The most I have been able to find was hand grinders and take them apart and use the whole peppers in the great electric grinder. I would purchase the unit again. HIghly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James Bishop

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since I don't have to push a button to grind. I like the way it works so far. I'm giving it 4 stars since it's only been a week and the first set I bought had one mill that didn't work. Given that experience, I'm not sure how long they will last, I plan to come back and add to the review after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Senthil Writes

customer_reviews.title: Was OK for first 5 months but.......
customer_reviews.text: Both units have stopped working, and consistently from the begining the dust from the grinding permeates into the battery compartment and corrodes the batteries. I changed out the batteries to ensure the batteries were not the culprit, but it still did not turn on and the batteries did get exetremely hot. When it worked it was great, but if I have to replace the units every 6 months then not so much.
customer_reviews.author: socalroger

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: This set has a very nice feel to it. Especially nice for arthritic thumbs, which make turning a knob very painful. My set did arrive with a slight defect in the grey knob,which I thought could shorten the life of the grinding mechanism, not sure. After a quick email to the service department the issue was immediately taken care of, without any problems. Not only is the product nice, the company Chew Fun is excellent to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spiller

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about whether I’d like these and it turns out I love them! Best thing ever! The grind is completely adjustable so I can have fine pepper for after cooking and course pepper doe during cooking. They are not getting mucked up with the salt and pepper that never fall, like other grinders do, and the light truly helps to see just how much you’re getting. My whole family love these!
customer_reviews.author: LoriL

customer_reviews.title: 2 broke in 3 weeks :/
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item a month ago and used about 8-10 times....completely stopped working! Went for a refund but opted for a free exchange instead giving them the “benefit of doubt” and received my new one within 3 days which was cool. Used the second one LITERALLY THREE TIMES....stopped working completely. The grinder motor is too weak and the peppercorns are just too tuff I presume...just a cheap product and total waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: tajy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although the gravity grinders worked well for over 1-year, one of them stopped working. I tried to reach customer service on Amazon's website where I was told that I could not reach manufacturer. I tried to repair unsuccessfully, and had to throw it out. It is still being sold on Amazon & do not know why I could not get help.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Dickler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well on both salt and pepper. My mom likes them because they're easy on old hands and arthritis. My baby was playing with the clear container where you put the pepper and he threw it on the ground. No cracks, no scratches. We've had them for about two weeks and so far, we're very happy with our purchase. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Erin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: installed the 6 AAA batteries and it works perfect. fine to coarse works great, i add a lot of pepper when I smoke beef, pork, chicken... what used to take minutes to grind fresh pepper now takes seconds! Would recommend for BBQ'ers or just to have in the kitchen or dinning table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: the device does not turn off. It only turns on when your turn it upside down and it wont turn off. I opened this and set it up past the 30 d return period and I am having a hard time contacting the company. There are much better devices out there. like ones with actual switches.
customer_reviews.author: Rothbard

customer_reviews.title: Will eventually become unusable. Trust me I’ve purchased twice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product twice and have - twice - run into issues with one of the grinders right at the one year mark. My first pair I took apart and it is cheap materials and will not last. I’ve - twice- run into issues with the salt grinder. The adjustable wheel at the top becomes stuck. Will not buy a third time
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Batteries blew up inside of it!
customer_reviews.text: We loved these for the first 2 months, then the salt shaker stopped working. We tried new batteries and it still would not grind but the lights came on. Today we heard a pop noise from the kitchen...walked in and the salt grinder was smoking. The batteries had popped inside of it! Clearly there is an issue with this design! No communication back from company because it is outside of the 30 day window that is from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get this a LONG time ago!!!??
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have horrible arthritis in our hands. I'm constantly getting my hands stuck and in horrible pain while grinding salt and pepper but I prefer fresh ground. THis was a godsend!! Absolutely amazing!! I can have my freshly ground salt and pepper without the cramped sore hands!!! I'll be gifting this to all my family who have arthritis!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set in March of 2019 and absolutely fell in love with them. I have Carpal Tunnel in both wrists and not having to "twist grind" is so helpful. The design is sleek and modern and goes great with my kitchen. In January 2020, one of the grinders got a little quirky and then just stopped working. I reached out to Chew Fun and within 3 days my new one was loaded up and working. This is what great Customer Service is all about. Thanks Chew Fun for rising to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful salt and pepper grinder!
customer_reviews.text: we fell in love with this salt and pepper grinder for its looks but then, we got to know their insides, and oh my! the feel very nice to the touch and they work effortlessly, gravity does it all! we of course got compliments from our guests when passing the salt and pepper , therefore I assure you that this shakers set make a great gift, a useful gift those you love!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Cool grinders...Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So easy to use..just tip and they grind. No buttons to push. They also light up. One recently quit working (had them almost a year now). I contacted the seller and they were very nice and supportive. They immediately sent a new one out to me. So they will definitely honor the 1 year warranty mentioned. They also told me to please contact if any issues even if it's after the 1 year warranty. I thought that was very nice and felt they care about their customers and products.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Llano

customer_reviews.title: Not for use at the table.
customer_reviews.text: The speed at which the salt comes out is way too fast- and there is little control over it (friends have one that the button has to be pushed for salt to come out- much easier to use). Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Product!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the pair about 9 months ago - they are used occasionally. I have found them to be a bit of a problem from the start, however, the pepper grinder is now completely dead. I took it apart, cleaned it, brand new batteries, everything I could think of and nothing. I wrote to the company letting them know about the SHORT life span of the product and they never responded. Don't waste your money.
